name: automation-test
description: Using Cypress you need to create the following test cases on this website: https://www.saucedemo.com   1. Login as standard user : Confirm login and check the URL  2. Login as standard user : Add item to cart, verify quantity, check remove button visibility  3. Login as problem user : Check that the onesie image is shown as the source for the onesie  (this test should fail since the correct image isn't shown)  4. Login with locked user : Login with this user and confirm error is displayed  5. Login with error user : Add fleece jacked to cart and confirm (this should fail)
